description: This book purports to contain hidden tips that will make you serene and calm in the face of the most grievous calamities. Cataclysms, one might say.

This notebook is mostly a series of fanciful speculations about something the author alternately calls "Matrix Mechanics,", "Dimensional Metaphysics," or "Netherium Mathematics," sometimes using more than one in the same sentence.  Most of it is incoherent, but there is some experimental data about "Conscious redirection of nether energy" that catches your eye.
